          <title>
            <string language="fr">Combustibles fossiles</string>
            <string language="en">Fossil fuels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fossilbrennstoffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combustíveis fossil</string>

          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre l'origine du charbon, du  gas, et du pétrole en tant que combustibles fossiles.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the origin of coal, gas, and oil as fossil fuels.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">charbon</string>
            <string language="en">coal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">combustible fossile</string>
            <string language="en">fossil fuel</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="fr">gaz</string>

          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Ursprung der Kohle, des 
Gases und des Öls als Fossilbrennstoffe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a origem do carvão, do 
gás, e do óleo como combustíveis fossil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'origine di carbone, 
di gas e di petrolio come combustibili fossili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την προέλευση του 
άνθρακα, αέριο, και του πετρελαίου ως απολιθωμένα καύσιμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el origen del carbón, 
del gas, y del aceite como combustibles fósiles.</string>
